item.title: Five Ways to Squeeze More ROI Out of Your Server Room
item.description:
Servers are crucial for modern businesses as they manage internal and external data. While this service requires investment, a strategic approach to your server infrastructure can lead to long-term cost savings without affecting performance. Here are five methods to maximize your server room’s ROI. Prioritize Cooling: Efficient cooling is vital for managing server room energy costs. Servers generate significant heat, demanding more than just internal fans. Several factors, both inside and outside the cabinet, can impact cooling efficiency...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/five-ways-to-squeeze-more-roi-out-of-your-server-room/

item.title: HDBaseT Looks To Unseat HDMI
item.description:
HDMI cables, while necessary for digital video, are notoriously expensive and limited in length. Standard network cables, like Cat5e or Cat6, offer a more affordable and longer-reaching alternative. HDBaseT technology may soon bridge this gap, enabling the use of network cables for video transmission. The HDBaseT Alliance, comprised of industry leaders such as LG, Samsung, Sony, and Valens Semiconductor, is spearheading this development. Their goal is to replace specialized HDMI cables with standard LAN cables, simplifying connections...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hdbaset-looks-to-unseat-hdmi/
